tags.description: PR that fixes a bug. Please refer to the appropriate issue(s) if relevant.

commits.author: pi8027
commits.message:
Generalize interval lemmas

- Generalize `mem0_itv(cc|oo)_xNx` and `oppr_itv(|oo|co|oc|cc)` lemmas from
  `numFieldType` to `numDomainType`, which have been specialized in PR #458
  accidentally.
- Generalize `mid_in_itv(|oo|cc)` lemmas from `realFieldType` to `numFieldType`.
